Your goals are:

- Infer the underlying rule for how the machine turns on.

You will be prompted at each turn to choose actions.

> False

2. When object 2 was placed alone on the machine, the light turned on (suggesting object 2 is a blicket).

5. The only object that definitively turned the machine on by itself was object 2.

Since we never saw object 6 activate the machine by itself, and it only kept the machine on when placed with object 2 (a known blicket), we cannot conclude it is a blicket.

> False
